titleStmt.title: A voyage into Nevv England begun in 1623. and ended in 1624 Performed by Christopher Levett, his Maiesties woodward of Somerset-shire, and one of the Councell of New-England.
titleStmt.author: Levett, Christopher, 1586-1630.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
Running title reads: Leuetts voyage to New England.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
